TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventBindingService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService
Public MustInherit Class EventBindingService Implements IEventBindingService

summary.span: 接口的默认实现。

span.span: A default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供注册组件事件的事件处理程序的服务， 提供了一种方法，用于通过设计器代码将事件处理程序与组件事件链接。By providing a service for registering event handlers for component events, provides a way to link an event handler with a component event from designer code.

permission.span: 用于完全访问系统资源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的名称必须与正在使用的脚本语言兼容，并且不能与代码中的任何其他名称冲突。The name returned by the method must be compatible with the script language being used and it must not conflict with any other name in your code.

summary.span: 提供一个通知，声明特定方法不再由某个事件处理程序使用。

span.span: Provides a notification that a particular method is no longer being used by an event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些实现可能打算在没有事件使用事件处理程序时将其删除。Some implementations may intend to remove the event handler when no events are using it. 通过重写 和 ，实现可以推断何时不再需要某个方法。By overriding and , an implementation can infer when a method is no longer needed.

summary.span: 返回兼容方法的名称集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of names of compatible methods.

returns.span: 兼容方法名称的字符串的集合。

span.span: A collection of strings that are names of compatible methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中返回的每个字符串都是方法的方法名称，该方法的签名与 `e`中包含的委托兼容。Each string returned in the collection is the method name of a method whose signature is compatible with the delegate contained in `e`. 如果没有兼容的名称， 应返回一个空集合。 should return an empty collection if no names are compatible.

span.span: The method name to validate.

summary.span: 验证提供的方法名称对于正在使用的语言或脚本是有效的。

span.span: Validates that the provided method name is valid for the language or script being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 如果名称对于使用无效，则可以重写此参数并引发异常。You may override this and throw an exception if the name is invalid for your use.
